name: **Illanarva**
description: Illanarva B721-143 Sheet 1 Off the N tip of Inishmeal, a small low lying rocky hummocky type island with rough grazing and patches of heather. Kayak landings are possible onto small bays along both W and E sides. The island is periodically grazed. Tides flow strongly particularly at spring tides periods on both sides of the island and through the narrow channels. Camping is possible but not attractive. No water found.
